Class UIService

java.lang.Object
com.example.theaterproject.Services.UIService
public class UIService extends Object
Service for common UI operations. Provides reusable methods for window management, alerts, and FXML loading.

    • openModalDialog

      public javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader openModalDialog(String pFxmlFileName, String pTitle) throws IOException
      Opens a new modal dialog window with the specified FXML file. The dialog is modal and will block interaction with other windows until closed. Uses the default screen size.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • openModalDialog

      public javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader openModalDialog(String pFxmlFileName, String pTitle, double pWidth, double pHeight) throws IOException
      Opens a new modal dialog window with the specified FXML file and custom dimensions. The dialog is modal and will block interaction with other windows until closed.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • loadFXML

      public javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loadFXML(String pFxmlFileName) throws IOException
      Loads an FXML file and returns the FXMLLoader for accessing the controller.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • openNewWindow

      public void openNewWindow(String pFxmlFileName, String pTitle, javafx.event.ActionEvent pEvent) throws IOException
      Opens a new window with the specified FXML file and closes the current window. Uses the default screen size.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • openNewWindow

      public void openNewWindow(String pFxmlFileName, String pTitle, javafx.event.ActionEvent pEvent, double pWidth, double pHeight) throws IOException
      Opens a new window with the specified FXML file and closes the current window. Uses custom dimensions.
